text:
@realDonaldTrump If only you cared as much for the 137,000 American lives lost through your mismanagement of the COVID-19 crisis

@GOP another day, another string of directionless, incoherent rants that no more provide a reason to re-elect this idiot than the ingredients of a pack of Twinkies do!
